prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with sharp black features and glowing accents.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies light and darkness with intricate designs.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon with long limbs and a sleek silhouette in shades of black.
Make a mythical creature with an enigmatic aura and a combination of shadowy elements.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon with a unique body shape that represents both strength and mystery.
Design a ghostly figure that blends into its surroundings and has striking contrasting colors.
Give me a Pokemon that stands out in battles with its towering presence and radiant features.
